entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Spiritwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Spiritwood 03:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -22.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.0°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
